All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, CoConsole, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, javax.swing.Scrollable, java.io.Serializable
public final class JCoConsoleTextArea
extends javax.swing.JTextArea
implements CoConsole

Displays remote commands and server replies.

Optional component of JFtpBrowsePanel.

0.72 08/10/2003

Bea Petrovicova
